item.title: Hackers who breached ION say ransom paid; company declines comment
item.description: The hackers who claimed responsibility for a disruptive breach at financial data firm ION say a ransom has been paid, although they declined to say how much it was or offer any evidence that the money had been handed over.
item.itunes:title: Hackers who breached ION say ransom paid; company declines comment

item.title: ISRO-NASA built satellite ready to be shipped to India for launch
item.description: ISRO Chairman S Somanath visited NASA?s Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) in the US state of California on Friday to oversee the final electrical testing of the NASA-ISRO Synthetic Aperture Radar (NISAR) satellite before being shipped to India.

item.title: Jupiter's moon count jumps to 92, most in solar system
item.description: The Jupiter moons were added recently to a list kept by the International Astronomical Union?s Minor Planet Center, said Scott Sheppard of the Carnegie Institution, who was part of the team.
